name: Pong CLASSIC (Raixu)
description:
Pong CLASSIC is a free-to-play 2022 recreation of the original 1972 pong game launched on the Atari. Pong CLASSIC can be played on PC and mobile and has PS4/Xbox one controller support. Play in classic mode or retro mode, the best of both worlds. Classic mode is the refined version of pong I have built and retro mode is supposed to be more accurate to the original Atari version of pong.

 P.S. There is a secret mode somewhere. Go find it!
